titleStmt.title: Corpus Parlamentari en català ParlaMint-ES-CT-en, 2018-05-04 0702.ana [ParlaMint-en.ana SAMPLE]
Catalan parliamentary corpus ParlaMint-ES-CT-en, 2018-05-04 0702.ana [ParlaMint-en.ana SAMPLE]

respStmt.resp: Data retrieval, first conversion to XML and to ParlaMint TEI
Machine translation to English and linguistic analysis of the translation
Annotating MTed corpora with USAS semantic tags

availability.p: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License

bibl.title: Parlament de Catalunya diaris de sessions de parlamentaries
Parliament of Catalonia daily sessions

projectDesc.p: ParlaMint is a project that aims to (1) create a multilingual set of comparable corpora of parliamentary proceedings uniformly encoded according to the ParlaMint encoding guidelines, covering the period from 2015 to mid-2022; (2) add linguistic annotations to the corpora and machine-translate them to English; (3) make the corpora available through concordancers; and (4) build use cases in Political Sciences and Digital Humanities based on the corpus data.

prefixDef.p: Private URIs with this prefix point to aligned source elements of the MTed corpus.

div.head: Sessió 7.2
div.note: The session, which was suspended yesterday, is resumed at nine in the morning and six minutes. He presides over the President of Parliament, accompanied by all the members of the Bureau, who are assisted by the Secretary General, the President Major and the President Fernando Domínguez Garcia.

u.note: Motion for a resolution on the defence of civil and political rights

div.note: The session rises to a quarter of two in the middle and six minutes.
